issue.title: Could we add a choke to the solar array power cable

content.raw: Acknowledging that more talented teams could have more tricks I have not figured out. But the cable+choke design seems to make it unnecessarily hard for the robot. Any mercy from the organizers to make grasping deterministic will be gratefully received :)
content.html: Acknowledging that more talented teams could have more tricks I have not figured out. But the cable+choke design seems to make it unnecessarily hard for the robot. Any mercy from the organizers to make grasping deterministic will be gratefully received :)
